Address.Address1: Cnr Parkes Street And Valentine Avenue

Description.Text: Set in a prime location of Sydney, Mantra Parramatta Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage. Internet access â€“ wireless, whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort makes Mantra Parramatta Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Sydney.
